Autonomy Lab, 2021.

item.title: Autonomous and Connected Systems
item.description: Objective We are envisioning a Cooper-based center for autonomous and connected vehicles in smart cities. This center will focus on two main objectives: Development of new technologies that contribute to sustainable and resilient transport systems ​ Creation and development of a multidisciplinary educational model that teaches students the concepts of autonomous vehicles using real-world customized cars. ​ Governors Island has been identified as a likely location for both performing research and educational activities involving real-world autonomous cars.
